title: Tablespoons to Cups Converter (US, Metric, UK) | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: US system: cups = tablespoons ÷ 16 Metric system: 1 metric cup = 250 mL, 1 tbsp = 15 mL → 1 cup = 250 ÷ 15 ≈ 16.6667 tbsp cups = tablespoons ÷ 16.6667 UK/Imperial: 1 UK cup = 284 mL, 1 tbsp = 15 mL → 1 cup ≈ 18.9333 tbsp cups = tablespoons ÷ 18.9333
